long_description: With a low-profile frame that helps maximize your peripheral vision, the Oakley Crowbar snow goggles make it easy to scope out more of the terrain below you so you can ride with confidence. Streamlined frame design expands your peripheral vision so you can see more of the mountain below you. Black Iridium lens has a copper tint, 20% visible light transmission (VLT) and a glare-cutting mirror finish, offering accurate color on bright, sunny days. Spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Antifog treatment and lens vents combat lens fogging, delivering clear vision in changing weather. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Durable frame is made of a conforming, flexibile plastic to ensure a comfortable fit all day long and in changing temperatures. Strap outriggers hinge to create a flush fit that minimizes gaps and distributes pressure evenly across your face. The helmet-compatible design of the Oakley Crowbar snow goggles fits medium-size faces.
